jobDescription: Job Details  Under the supervision of the System Director, Business Analytics & Data Governance this position will support the processes and initiatives to grow and mature data and analytic capabilities throughout the organization. Through collaborative relationships with IT and management throughout the various EEH entities, this position is directly responsible for turning data into critical information and knowledge that can be used to make sound business decisions and to identify and support operational improvement initiatives through tool development and analysis, as well as ad hoc reporting. Required Education and/or Experience: Requires a bachelor's degree in business administration, finance or a related field.  A minimum of 3 years of previous business analytical experience preferably in the Healthcare Industry.  Proficiency with Microsoft Office Suite with an emphasis on Excel.  Understanding of Business Intelligence Terminology.  Experience using Tableau or other data mining and visualization applications and preferred experience using SQL and/or Crystal report writing tools.  Must be strong at problem solving and demonstrate an analytical mindset.  Desire to learn, grow, and seek increased responsibility.  Strong written, verbal communication and presentation skills. Must be able to convey information in a clear, focused, and concise manner.SDL2017
